tag_list: ruby-on-rails, scrum, agile, custom-web-applications, custom-web-development, web-development-outsourcing, offshore-development, b2b, b2c, e-business-systems, e-commerce-applications, business-process-optimization-tools, e-commerce, customer-relationships
overview:
I have been managing web development projects since 1999. I am an Owner and Project Manager at Selleo. I gathered the key people around the original idea of Selleo and thus laid the foundations for the business back in 2005. I am interested in e-commerce, particularly payment mechanisms, which has allowed me to manage our projects in the area. My preoccupation with B2C solutions has led me to co-ordinate Selleo’s efforts to provide better GUIs, usability and user experience. When not working with Rails, I chill out playing the drums, taking photos or shooting video-clips. I hold a degree in software engineering from the University of Wales. I occasionally teach Computer Programming and Computer Graphic at the International School of Business, Design and Technology in Bielsko-Biala.

My Specialties: ruby on rails,scrum,agile,custom web applications,custom web development,web development outsourcing,Offshore Development,B2B,B2C,e-business systems,e-commerce applications,business-process optimization tools,e-Commerce, customer relationships management,sales order processes and purchase order processes,front-office applications,back-office applications,back-end applications,community sites, social networks,medical web2.0,healthcare online,bpm,GUIs,usability and user experience
